2015140.name: Overdrive
2015140.description:
Welcome to Overdrive.
Jump into the FPS experience in either Battle Royale or Assault.

Battle Royale: Drop into Pulsar Island and survive a deadly storm outbreak whilst enemy soldiers are fighting to be the last one standing.

Assault: Gear up for the most action-packed shooter experience you will ever play. Assault has modes such as Team Deathmatch where the team with the most amount of eliminations within five minutes wins. Respawning is enabled and there are many things to use to your advantage such as the destructible terrain.
2015140.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
